text: Yalli burtak sin gine (Aadam kinnuk) tohuk lakat qunxuffek sin gine (tiffoyta kinnuk), tohuk lakat sayim kee labim sin abe, kaadu say-tiyay bagut haysitta matanaay xalta matan Yallih ixxiga edde tan tet akke waytek, qumri kah ossima numuy qumri kah yaxxeere mayan, kaadu kay qumrik daggoysaanaah, yayxuuxeenim matan Yallih xaqul yan kitaabal tani tet akke waytek (lawcal macfuuz kinnuk), diggah toh Yallal xabcinih
